name: base32
shortDescription: base32 encode/decode data and print to standard output
longDescription: Base32 encode or decode FILE, or standard input, to standard output.

options.name: decode
options.description: Change the mode of operation, from the default of encoding data, to decoding data.  Input is expected to be base64 encoded data, and the output will be the original data.

options.name: wrap
options.description: During encoding, wrap lines after COLS characters.  This must be a positive number.

options.name: ignore-garbage
options.description: When decoding, newlines are always accepted.  During decoding, ignore unrecognized bytes, to permit distorted data to be decoded.
